[{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.mainPanel.dashboard.newDisputeMeeting"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"//newDisputeMeetingrequest.visible = true;\\n//mainPanel.visible = false;\\n//fetch dispute details from ea and district\\nvar params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar actualData=JSON.parse(window.atob(params.get('input')));\\n//console.log(actualData);\\n//console.log(\\"hh\\")\\nvar jsonData = {\\n \\"contractKey\\" : actualData.contract_number\,\\n \\"ea\\" : actualData.ea\,\\n \\"district\\" : actualData.district\\n}; \\n//console.log(jsonData);\\nvar dollarUSLocale12 = Intl.NumberFormat('en-US');\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'GET'\, \\n data: jsonData\,\\n url: 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetTotalPCPDetails'\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n //console.log(data);\\n \\t var data1=JSON.parse(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"DRBMembersDetailsJson\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n \\t var data2=JSON.parse(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"LinkedDetailsJson\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n \\t //console.log(typeof(data2));\\n if(typeof(data1.PCP_Details.Record.PCP_MAIN_PK)===\\"undefined\\"){\\n \\tcount1=data1.PCP_Details.Record.length;\\n }\\n else{\\n count1=1;\\n }\\n \\t if(typeof(data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord.PCP_MAIN_PK)===\\"undefined\\"){\\n \\tcount2=data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord.length;\\n }\\n else{\\n count2=1;\\n }\\n \\t if(count1===1){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].PCRNoNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record.PCP_MAIN_PK;\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record.D_IPC_DESCR!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].DescNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record.D_IPC_DESCR;\\n }\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record.E_EST_COST!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].DollarNew.value=\\"$ \\"+dollarUSLocale12.format(data1.PCP_Details.Record.E_EST_COST);\\n }\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record.E_TIME_IMPACT!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].DelayDaysNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record.E_TIME_IMPACT;\\n }\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record.E_REC_DATE!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].DateSuppNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record.E_REC_DATE;\\n }\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record.E_COMMENT_DATE!==\\"null\\"){\\n \\ttablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].DateResNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record.E_COMMENT_DATE;\\n } \\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].visible=true;\\n if(count2===1){\\n \\tif(data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord.PCP_MAIN_PK === data1.PCP_Details.Record.PCP_MAIN_PK && tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].newDisputetableItem11.enabled === true){\\n \\ttablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].newDisputetableItem11.enabled=false;\\n \\ttablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].DateReferNew.value=data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord.CREATED_DATE;\\n \\t}\\n }\\n /*else if(count2>1){\\n for(var j=0; j<data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord.length; j++){\\n // && tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].PCRNoNew.enabled === true\\n if(data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord[j].PCP_MAIN_PK === tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].newDisputetableItem11.enabled=false;\\n }\\n }\\n }*/\\n }\\n else{\\n \\tfor(var i=0; i<data1.PCP_Details.Record.length; i++){\\n tablenewDispute.tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n //alert(data.PCP_Details.Record[i].PCP_MAIN_PK);\\n tablenewDispute.tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].PCRNoNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].PCP_MAIN_PK;\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].D_IPC_DESCR!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].DescNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].D_IPC_DESCR;\\n }\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_EST_COST!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].DollarNew.value=\\"$ \\"+dollarUSLocale12.format(data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_EST_COST);\\n }\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_TIME_IMPACT!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].DelayDaysNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_TIME_IMPACT;\\n }\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_REC_DATE!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].DateSuppNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_REC_DATE;\\n }\\n if(data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_COMMENT_DATE!==\\"null\\"){\\n \\ttablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].DateResNew.value=data1.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_COMMENT_DATE;\\n }\\n k<data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord.length; k++){\\n // && tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].PCRNoNew.enabled === true\\n if(data2.Existing_Details.ExisRecord[k].PCP_MAIN_PK === j++){\\n \\tDisputeDashPCPTable.Tabel2Row1.instanceManager.removeInstance(1);\\n }\\n }\\n //DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item1.value\\n var dollarUSLocale = Intl.NumberFormat('en-US');\\n DisputeMeetIDHide.value=DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[this.parent.instanceIndex].table1_item1.value;\\n var Disid1 = DisputeMeetIDHide.value;\\n DisputeDashPCPTable.visible=true; fd:scripts.fd:init: [{"script":{"content":"var params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar actualData=JSON.parse(window.atob(params.get('input')));\\n//console.log(actualData);\\nif(actualData.userRole.toString().toUpperCase()===\\"RE\\" || actualData.userRole.toString().toUpperCase()===\\"CONTRACTOR\\"){\\n newDisputeMeeting.enabled=true;\\n}\\nelse{\\n newDisputeMeeting.enabled=false;\\n}\\n/*if(actualData.userRole.toString().toUpperCase()===\\"DRB_CHAIR\\" || actualData.userRole.toString().toUpperCase()===\\"DRA\\"){\\n SubmitDueMeetDateButton.enabled=true;\\n}\\nelse{\\n SubmitDueMeetDateButton.enabled=false;\\n}\\nif(actualData.userRole.toString().toUpperCase()===\\"DRB_CHAIR\\" || actualData.userRole.toString().toUpperCase()===\\"DRA\\"){\\n RescheduleDisputeMeet.enabled=true;\\n}\\nelse{\\n RescheduleDisputeMeet.enabled=false;\\n}*/\\nif(actualData.userRole.toString().toUpperCase()===\\"DRB_CHAIR\\" || actualData.userRole.toString().toUpperCase()===\\"DRA\\"){\\n SubmitDueMeetDateButton.enabled=true;\\n RescheduleDisputeMeet.enabled=true;\\n CloseDisputeButton.enabled=true;\\n MeetHeldButDD.enabled=true;\\n}\\nelse{\\n SubmitDueMeetDateButton.enabled=false;\\n RescheduleDisputeMeet.enabled=false;\\n CloseDisputeButton.enabled=false;\\n MeetHeldButDD.enabled=false;\\n}"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.mainPanel.dashboard"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:valueCommit: [{"script":{"content":"//console.log(this.value);\\nPosPaperDueDateDash.value=\\"\\";\\nvar meetingType;\\nfor(var i=0;i < DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instanceCount-1;i++){\\nif(DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].tableItem11.value==='Y'){\\n meetingType = DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item3.value;\\n break;\\n }\\n}\\nSuccDates.visible=false;\\nErrorDates.visible=false;\\nif(SelectDRADRB.value===\\"DRB\\" && meetingType.toUpperCase()===\\"TRADITIONAL\\"){\\n \\tvar disputeEarly = new Date(DisputeCreatedDatePM.value);\\n disputeEarly.setDate(disputeEarly.getDate() + 30); // Set now + 30 days as the new date\\n var disputeLate = new Date(DisputeCreatedDatePM.value);\\n disputeLate.setDate(disputeLate.getDate() + 60); // Set now + 30 days as the new date\\n var check = new Date(MeetDateDash.value);\\n //console.log(disputeEarly+\\" \\"+disputeLate);\\n if(check > disputeEarly && check < disputeLate){\\n var posdate = new Date(this.value);\\n posdate.setDate(posdate.getDate()-15);\\n var month=\\"\\"\,date1=\\"\\";\\n if(posdate.getMonth()>=9){\\n month=(parseInt(posdate.getMonth())+1);\\n }\\n else{\\n month=\\"0\\"+(parseInt(posdate.getMonth())+1);\\n } \\n if(posdate.getDate()>9){\\n date1=(parseInt(posdate.getDate()));\\n }\\n else{\\n date1=\\"0\\"+(parseInt(posdate.getDate()));\\n }\\n PosPaperDueDateDash.value=posdate.getFullYear()+\\"-\\"+month+\\"-\\"+date1;\\n }\\n else{\\n ErrorDates.visible=true;\\n ErrorDates.value=\\"Warning: Per Caltrans Standard Specifications\, the dispute meeting must be held no sooner than 30 days and no later than 60 days after the DRB receives the referral unless the parties otherwise agree.\\";\\n SuccDates.visible=false;\\n } \\n}\\nelse if(SelectDRADRB.value===\\"DRA\\" && meetingType.toUpperCase()===\\"TRADITIONAL\\"){\\n \\tvar disputeLate = new Date(DisputeCreatedDatePM.value);\\n disputeLate.setDate(disputeLate.getDate() + 25);\\n var check = new Date(MeetDateDash.value);\\n //console.log(check < disputeLate);\\n if(check < disputeLate){\\n var posdate = new Date(this.value);\\n posdate.setDate(posdate.getDate()-10);\\n var month=\\"\\"\,date1=\\"\\";\\n if(posdate.getMonth()>=9){\\n month=(parseInt(posdate.getMonth())+1);\\n }\\n else{\\n month=\\"0\\"+(parseInt(posdate.getMonth())+1);\\n }\\n if(posdate.getDate()>9){\\n date1=(parseInt(posdate.getDate()));\\n }\\n else{\\n date1=\\"0\\"+(parseInt(posdate.getDate()));\\n }\\n PosPaperDueDateDash.value=posdate.getFullYear()+\\"-\\"+month+\\"-\\"+date1;\\n }\\n\\telse{\\n ErrorDates.visible=true;\\n ErrorDates.value=\\"Warning: Per Caltrans Standard Specifications\, the dispute meeting must be held no later than 25 days after the DRA receives the referral unless the parties otherwise agree.\\";\\n SuccDates.visible=false;\\n }\\n}"\,"event":"Value Commit"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.panelduedate.MeetDateDash"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
